      • BluetoothLeTechnology

        public BluetoothLeTechnology(java.lang.String name,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> allowedBtLeDevices,
                     long validityTime)
        Creates the technology
        Parameters:
        name - name of the technology
        allowedBtLeDevices - whitelist of allowed btle devices or null, if all devices are allowed
        validityTime - delta time which describes for how long a received signal will be used
